programme.title: BOLELLI, Simone (ITA) / VAVASSORI, Andrea (ITA) vs. HELIOVAARA, Harri (FIN) / PATTEN, Henry (GBR) -
programme.desc: Extended Highlights of key matches form the Australian Open 2025 - The 113th edition of the Australian Open, kicking off the Grand Slam season in 2025, brings the world's best tennis players to Melbourne Park's iconic hard courts. Known for its electric atmosphere, the tournament promises thrilling matchups as top-ranked athletes and emerging talents compete for the prestigious title. Showcasing a perfect blend of tradition, innovation, and sportsmanship, the Australian Open 2025 sets the tone for an exciting year in tennis.

programme.title: Jannik Sinner (ITA) vs Alexander Zverev (GER) -Men's Singles Final - Road Laver Arena - Australian O
programme.desc: The 2025 Australian Open men’s singles final sees defending champion and World No. 1 Jannik Sinner taking on World No. 2 Alexander Zverev. Sinner chases his third Grand Slam title after dominating Ben Shelton in the semifinals. Zverev, still in search of his first Grand Slam title, advanced after Novak Djokovic retired due to injury. A thrilling battle unfolds, with Sinner’s aggressive play clashing against Zverev’s powerful serves and groundstrokes.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: After a run of nine consecutive wins against Levante in LaLiga between 2012 and 2016, Real Madrid have only won five of their last 11 meetings against them in the competition. Levante have taken points in three of their last five away games against Real Madrid in LaLiga, after losing 10 of their first 11 visits to the Santiago Bernabéu in the competition.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: After a run of nine consecutive wins against Levante in LaLiga between 2012 and 2016, Real Madrid have only won five of their last 11 meetings against them in the competition. Levante have taken points in three of their last five away games against Real Madrid in LaLiga, after losing 10 of their first 11 visits to the Santiago Bernabéu in the competition.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Osasuna are unbeaten in their last three Primera División matches against Real Oviedo and have never gone four consecutive top-flight meetings without defeat against them. After winning three of their first six away games at Osasuna in LaLiga, Real Oviedo have not won any of their last seven away games against Osasuna in the competition, failing to score in five of those matches.

programme.title: Osasuna vs Real Oviedo - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Wolves have won just two of their 21 Premier League games against Newcastle – only against Liverpool do they have a lower win rate among sides they’ve faced 10+ times in the competition. Newcastle have won six of their last eight Premier League games against Wolves, including each of the last four in a row. It’s as many victories as they’d managed in their previous 28 league games against them.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in all 13 of their Premier League games against Everton since their return to the division in 2019. Everton have lost each of their last four Premier League away games against Aston Villa, their longest losing run at Villa Park since between October 1995 and April 2001.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.title: West Ham United vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: West Ham are looking to complete their first league double over Nottingham Forest since 2011-12 in the Championship, and first in the top-flight since 1968-69. Nottingham Forest won this exact fixture 2-1 last season, last winning consecutive away league games against West Ham between 1982 and 1984.

programme.title: West Ham United vs. Nottingham Forest - English Premier League 2026/2027

programme.title: Burnley vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Burnley won their first ever Premier League home game against Man Utd 1-0 in August 2009. However, they’re winless in eight against them since then, scoring just one goal in the process. Though they’ve lost just two of their 19 Premier League games against Burnley, Man Utd are looking to secure the Premier League double over them for just the second time after 2020-21.

programme.title: Fulham vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Fulham won this exact fixture 3-2 last season, last winning consecutive home league games against Liverpool in May 2007. Fulham were one of just three teams Liverpool failed to beat in their Premier League title winning campaign last season along with Nottingham Forest and Arsenal.

programme.title: Arsenal vs. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Against no side have Arsenal lost more Premier League games than they have against Liverpool. programme.title: Manchester United vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Day 1 - M1 - Morning Session - Rod Laver Arena - Australian Open 2026

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.title: French Super Cup 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Trophée des Champions was the 30th edition of the French super cup. It took place at the Jaber Al-Ahmad International Stadium in Kuwait City, Kuwait. The match was contested by Paris Saint-Germain, the winners of the 2024–25 Ligue 1 and Coupe de France titles, and Marseille, the runners-up of the 2024–25 Ligue 1. Paris Saint-Germain won the match 4–1 on penalties for their fourteenth Trophée des Champions title.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Wolves have won just two of their 21 Premier League games against Newcastle – only against Liverpool do they have a lower win rate among sides they’ve faced 10+ times in the competition. Newcastle have won six of their last eight Premier League games against Wolves, including each of the last four in a row. It’s as many victories as they’d managed in their previous 28 league games against them.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Everton - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in all 13 of their Premier League games against Everton since their return to the division in 2019. Everton have lost each of their last four Premier League away games against Aston Villa, their longest losing run at Villa Park since between October 1995 and April 2001.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.desc: Extended Highlights of key matches form the Australian Open 2025 - The 113th edition of the Australian Open, kicking off the Grand Slam season in 2025, brings the world's best tennis players to Melbourne Park's iconic hard courts. Showcasing a perfect blend of tradition, innovation, and sportsmanship, the Australian Open 2025 sets the tone for an exciting year in tennis.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

Showcasing a perfect blend of tradition, innovation, and sportsmanship, the Australian Open 2025 sets the tone for an exciting year in tennis.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

programme.title: Nants vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). programme.title: Senegal Press conference – AFCON Morocco 2025
programme.desc: Senegal national team is scheduled to hold a press conference ahead of their match against Morocco in the final of TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nation. Sunday’s final will see Morocco attempt to complete a memorable home campaign against a Senegal side aiming to reclaim the title they won in 2021.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Troyes vs Reims - French Ligue 2 - 2025/2026
programme.desc: Ligue 2 is the second division of French football. Ligue 2 is contested by 18 clubs, the league operates on a system of promotion and relegation with both Ligue 1 and the third division Championnat National. The teams play 34 games each, totaling 306 games in the season. The biggest games from each match Day are live and exclusive on beIN.

programme.title: Swansea vs Birmingham - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Swansea haven’t won any of their last nine league matches against Birmingham City since a 3-1 win in July 2020. Birmingham are looking for their first league double over Swansea since the 1979-80 campaign following their 1-0 win earlier this campaign.

programme.title: Oxford Utd vs Bristol City - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Oxford are looking for a league double over Bristol City for the first time since the 1995-96 season under Denis Smith. Bristol City have won just two of their 18 league visits to Oxford United, winning 2-0 in 1972-73 and 1-0 in 2000-01.
